thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of transferwise.com | 27 of 1820
thread.title: Leo

author: Leo
title: Leo
text:
This is how sending money should be done. There are so many things done right, the ease of payment, the speed of transfer turn around, the convenience of the online experience.
My only suggestion for Transferwise came as I was filling out their quality feedback survey and noticed they had radio-boxes to select the most important of the following: cost, speed, convenience of their service. Honestly I would have to suggest they change the survey so that multiple options could be selected because the service is that far ahead of the bank option.
